tool_description:
Mental Disorders Identification API (Discontinued @28th November 2022 due to Heroku Free Tier)
- This API allows you to detect potential mental disorders via text.
- The API has been embedded with an ETL pipeline that is able to clean the data and run it by the AI model.
- The AI model was trained on reddit data using semi-supervised learning approach.
- The class labels were determined by a medical officer based on the keywords chosen by Latent Dirichlet Allocation that has been tuned.
- Log...
name: I'm All Ears
title: I'm All Ears

api_list.name: SEARCH
GET
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://i-m-all-ears.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "i-m-all-ears.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://i-m-all-ears.p.rapidapi.com/"

print(response.json())
